abstract.locale: The ramp of colors to use on a gradient is defined by the 'stop' elements that are child elements to either the 'linearGradient' element or the 'radialGradient' element.

description.locale: The 'stop-color' property indicates what color to use at that gradient stop.
The 'stop-opacity' property defines the opacity of a given gradient stop.
The offset attribute is either a number (usually ranging from 0 to 1) or a percentage which indicates where the gradient stop is placed.
